description: To get to the dining room at this restaurant you walk past the kitchen, where its stoves are lit and its chefs hard at work. This is the sort of restaurant that you’d love to have as your local, serving delicious traditional cuisine in a simple yet friendly setting. The dishes are resolutely Tuscan and the ingredients are of the highest quality.
